name: Pumpkin Face (Ch.1 Available!)
description:
It's Halloween and your face turned into a pumpkin overnight. Solve riddles, face your bullies and give in to the Halloween spirit in this bubbly, wholesome (and sometimes, a little spooky) Visual Novel by Leaflet and Mibyle.

Chapter 1 of Pumpkin Face is currently playable for free, and doubles as an entry to the Spooktober VN Jam 2021!

Buy the soundtrack : https://leafletmusic.bandcamp.com/album/pumpkin-face-ost
Get social with us : https://twitter.com/PumpkinFaceGame

Business people : we have a press kit! https://leaflet.notion.site/Pumpkin-Face-Presskit-1c56af6e9848407699b798f874b81a...
